contexts.context: "You can walk!" he said, <mark>laughing</mark>. "It's a miracle!"
Imalyn <mark>laughed</mark> loudly, "Can I see a demonstration sometime?"...
...and Plaster. He could see them now, Imalyn <mark>laughing</mark> and carrying on, Galsiah hushing him to avoid bringing...
..., but no place to go? Do you <mark>laugh</mark> and cry, but no longer feel? Do...
...a sweet thing with curly locks and a joyous <mark>laugh</mark> named Benitah Gorgoth. Once when at play he...
